definition: persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The indicting condition of civil lawsuit is exact in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国民事诉讼的起诉条件比较严格，对当事人不公平。

sentences.english: In taking such steps offenders are seeking forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 冒犯者以这种做出悔改的方式来寻求当事人的宽恕。

sentences.english: The premium rate of disproportional reinsurance by bilateral party agreed.
sentences.chinese: 非比例再保险的保险费率由双方当事人议定。

sentences.english: Touching the case, I suggest that we should go to ask the litigant.
sentences.chinese: 关于这个案子，我建议我们去问问当事人。

sentences.english: At last the litigants could easily interfere in cases, which hurts the fairness of justice.
sentences.chinese: 三是案件易受当事人不正当干预，影响司法公正。

sentences.english: His client was a middle-aged man who lost his wife two months ago.
sentences.chinese: 他的当事人是一位两个月前丧偶的男性。

sentences.english: Pending settlement of the dispute over water, none of the parties may unilaterally alter the existing water regime.
sentences.chinese: 在水事纠纷解决前，当事人不得单方面改变现状。

sentences.english: The chief method is to take depositions of parties and witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 主要的方法是录取当事人和证人的宣誓证言。

sentences.english: The form of decision for administrative penalty shall be given to the party on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 行政处罚决定书应当当场交付当事人。

sentences.english: Proceedings may also instituted directly in a people's court if the parties do not wish to settle the dispute by mediation.
sentences.chinese: 当事人不愿调解的，也可以直接向人民法院起诉。

sentences.english: There are two bases upon which the court may assess the amount of costs recoverable.
sentences.chinese: 法院可基于两点来评估当事人应获得的诉讼费数额。

sentences.english: The award may be made public only with the consent of both parties.
sentences.chinese: 裁决书须经双方当事人同意方得公布。

sentences.english: He has some other kind of relationship with a party to the case, which might affect the impartial handling of the case.
sentences.chinese: 与本案当事人有其他关系，可能影响案件的公正处理。

sentences.english: He has any other relationship with any party concerned so that the impartial handling of the case might be affected.
sentences.chinese: 与本案当事人有其他关系，可能影响案件公正处理的。

sentences.english: If no objections have been raised, the parties must execute the arbitration decision.
sentences.chinese: 对仲裁裁决无异议的，当事人必须履行。

sentences.english: The responsibility of criminal counsels should be to safeguard the legal rights of their clients.
sentences.chinese: 刑事辩护律师的责任应当是维护当事人的合法权益。

definition: to be in charge/to be confronted (with a matter)/involved (in some matter)
to consider as a matter of importance/to be of importance
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
examination of the evidence of the opposing party in a court of law
